BEGINNING THURSDAY EVENING, 0CTOBER 8, 1925 Matinees Wednesday and Saturday THE ACTORS' THEATRE presents ARTHUR SCHNITZLER’S CALDÖF EIFE THE English version by Dorothy Donnelly Directed by Dudley Digges Settings designed by Jo Mielziner Cast (In order of their appearance) EGON BRECHER MOSER MARIE, his daughter..........
